text: "Modern Woman" is a 1986 song by Billy Joel and is the leading single from his 10th studio album The Bridge. It was used in the 1986 movie Ruthless People. It went to number 10 in the United States, number 21 in Australia, number 27 in Canada and number 28 in New Zealand. ==References== Category:1986 songs Category:Billy Joel songs
title: Modern Woman
